kou commented on a change in pull request #8995:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8995#discussion_r548216878



##########
File path: dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/github.osx.yml
##########
@@ -0,0 +1,71 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at

+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+# NOTE: must set "Crossbow" as name to have the badge links working in the
+# github comment reports!
+name: Crossbow
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - "*-github-*"
+
+jobs:
+  package:
+    name: Package Gandiva
+    runs-on: macos-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout Arrow
+        run: |
+          git clone --no-checkout {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+          git -C arrow fetch -t {{ arrow.remote }} {{ arrow.branch }}
+          if [ $CROSSBOW_USE_COMMIT_ID = true ]; then git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}; else git -C arrow checkout FETCH_HEAD; fi
+          git -C arrow submodule update --init --recursive
+      - name: Build Gandiva
+        run: |
+          cd arrow
+          mkdir -p dist
+          export ARROW_TEST_DATA=$GITHUB_WORKSPACE/arrow/testing/data

Review comment:
       
   How about using `$PWD` instead of `$GITHUB_WORKSPACE/arrow`?
   ```suggestion
             export ARROW_TEST_DATA=$PWD/testing/data
   ```

##########
File path: dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/github.linux.yml
##########
@@ -0,0 +1,72 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+# NOTE: must set "Crossbow" as name to have the badge links working in the
+# github comment reports!
+name: Crossbow
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - "*-github-*"
+
+jobs:
+  package:
+    name: Package Gandiva
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout Arrow
+        run: |
+          git clone --no-checkout {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+          git -C arrow fetch -t {{ arrow.remote }} {{ arrow.branch }}
+          if [ $CROSSBOW_USE_COMMIT_ID = true ]; then git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}; else git -C arrow checkout FETCH_HEAD; fi
+          git -C arrow submodule update --init --recursive
+      - name: Build Gandiva
+        run: |
+          python3 -VV
+          cd arrow
+          mkdir -p dist
+          export CC="gcc-4.9" CXX="g++-4.9"
+          ulimit -c unlimited -S
+          docker run -v $PWD:/io -v $PWD:/arrow quay.io/projjal/arrow:gandivadocker /io/dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/build-cpp-linux.sh || exit 1
+          dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/build-java.sh || exit 1

Review comment:
       How about using `set -e` instead of `|| exit 1`?

##########
File path: dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/github.osx.yml
##########
@@ -0,0 +1,71 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+# NOTE: must set "Crossbow" as name to have the badge links working in the
+# github comment reports!
+name: Crossbow
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - "*-github-*"
+
+jobs:
+  package:
+    name: Package Gandiva
+    runs-on: macos-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout Arrow
+        run: |
+          git clone --no-checkout {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+          git -C arrow fetch -t {{ arrow.remote }} {{ arrow.branch }}
+          if [ $CROSSBOW_USE_COMMIT_ID = true ]; then git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}; else git -C arrow checkout FETCH_HEAD; fi
+          git -C arrow submodule update --init --recursive
+      - name: Build Gandiva
+        run: |
+          cd arrow
+          mkdir -p dist
+          export ARROW_TEST_DATA=$GITHUB_WORKSPACE/arrow/testing/data
+          dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/build-cpp-osx.sh || exit 1
+          dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/build-java.sh || exit 1
+        env:
+          OS_NAME: "osx"
+          CHECK_SHARED_DEPENDENCIES: true
+          MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET: "10.11"
+      - name: Set up Crossbow
+        run: |
+          brew install libgit2
+          pip3 install \
+            click \
+            github3.py \
+            jinja2 \
+            jira \
+            pygit2 \
+            ruamel.yaml \
+            setuptools_scm \
+            toolz
+      - name: Upload artifacts
+        run: |
+          python3 $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/arrow/dev/tasks/crossbow.py \
+            --queue-path $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/arrow \

Review comment:
       ```suggestion
             python3 arrow/dev/tasks/crossbow.py \
               --queue-path arrow \
   ```

Review comment:
       Can we simplify volume usage?
   
   ```suggestion
             docker run -v $PWD:/arrow quay.io/projjal/arrow:gandivadocker /arrow/dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/build-cpp-linux.sh || exit 1
   ```

File path: dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/github.linux.yml
##########
@@ -0,0 +1,72 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+# NOTE: must set "Crossbow" as name to have the badge links working in the
+# github comment reports!
+name: Crossbow
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - "*-github-*"
+
+jobs:
+  package:
+    name: Package Gandiva
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout Arrow
+        run: |
+          git clone --no-checkout {{ arrow.remote }} arrow
+          git -C arrow fetch -t {{ arrow.remote }} {{ arrow.branch }}
+          if [ $CROSSBOW_USE_COMMIT_ID = true ]; then git -C arrow checkout {{ arrow.head }}; else git -C arrow checkout FETCH_HEAD; fi
+          git -C arrow submodule update --init --recursive
+      - name: Build Gandiva
+        run: |
+          python3 -VV
+          cd arrow
+          mkdir -p dist
+          export CC="gcc-4.9" CXX="g++-4.9"
+          ulimit -c unlimited -S
+          docker run -v $PWD:/io -v $PWD:/arrow quay.io/projjal/arrow:gandivadocker /io/dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/build-cpp-linux.sh || exit 1
+          dev/tasks/gandiva-jars/build-java.sh || exit 1
+        env:
+          OS_NAME: "linux"
+          CHECK_SHARED_DEPENDENCIES: true
+      - name: Set up Crossbow
+        run: |
+          sudo apt-get install -y libgit2-dev
+          pip3 install \
+            click \
+            github3.py \
+            jinja2 \
+            jira \
+            pygit2==1.0.3 \
+            ruamel.yaml \
+            setuptools_scm \
+            toolz
+      - name: Upload artifacts
+        run: |
+          python3 $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/arrow/dev/tasks/crossbow.py \
+            --queue-path $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/arrow \

Review comment:
       Can we remove `$GITHUB_WORKSPACE/`?
   
   ```suggestion
             python3 arrow/dev/tasks/crossbow.py \
               --queue-path arrow \
   ```

File path: dev/tasks/tasks.yml

     - centos-*-aarch64
 
   gandiva:
-    - gandiva-*
+    - gandiva-jar-ubuntu
+    - gandiva-jar-osx

Review comment:
       Could you revert this change?
   `gandiva-*` is expanded to `gandiva-ja-ubuntu` and `gandiva-jar-osx` automatically.
